text: In the company of one of his acolytes, the devil came for a long walk around planet Earth. Having heard that the earth was the land of hatred and wickedness, corruption and wickedness, he left his kingdom for a few days to enjoy his journey. The teacher and the disciple were walking quietly when, suddenly, the latter saw a real particle. I was alarmed and warned the devil, "Lord, there's a real particle there, be careful not to spread it". And the devil, without disturbing him in the least, replied, "Don't worry, they'll institutionalize it. FIN
title: Una partícula de verdad
author: nan Anónimo
